import type React from "react" import { useState } from "react" import { PawPrint, Search } from "lucide-react" import Button from "./ui/Button" import { Card, CardContent } from "./ui/Card" import Input from "./ui/Input" const PetCard = ({ pet }) => (

) // Hypothetical semantic search function const semanticSearch = async (query: string) => { console.log("Performing semantic search for:", query) await new Promise((resolve) => setTimeout(resolve, 1000)) return [ { id: 1, name: "Buddy", type: "Dog", age: "Young", size: "Medium", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=100&width=100" }, { id: 2, name: "Whiskers", type: "Cat", age: "Adult", size: "Small", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=100&width=100", }, ] } const AdoptionPage = () => { const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState("") const [pets, setPets] = useState([]) const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false) const handleSearch = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() setIsLoading(true) try { const results = await semanticSearch(searchQuery) setPets(results) } catch (error) { console.error("Error performing search:", error) } finally { setIsLoading(false) } } return (
